data.text:
Blind Horse Books is on vacation from July 21, 2024 to July 29, 2024. We are traveling and will be at the Tennessee Antiquarian Book and Paper Show in Nashville July 26-25. All orders placed will not be shipped until Tuesday July 30.

Scithers, George H. - Editor

Isaac Asimov's Science Fiction Magazine May 1979; with Signed Story by Barry Longyear

New York: Davis Publications, 1979. Cover Illustration by Jack Gaughan. Illustrated Wraps.

Signed by Author Barry Longyear on his 'Quest' story page. The Cover Art by Jack Gaughan illustrates "The Quest".

No Flaws or Blemishes but minimal shelf handling; The bindings are tight and square. Text clean, age-toning and evidence of a mailing label are the only flaws to note; no spine crease.

Very Good / No Dust Jacket As Issued. Item #18853

Barry Longyear is a Hugo, Nebula, and Campbell Award winner, he is best known as the author of Enemy Mine.

Price: $14.95

See all items in SCIENCE FICTION, FANTASY and HORROR

See all items by George H. - Scithers
